data.title: VIRTUAL Salon Event
data.text:
The {VIRTUAL} Salon was created by award-winning author and community builder, Na'ima B. Robert, to encourage discussion and exploration within the Muslim space. The weekly sessions bring together Muslim intellectuals, creatives and activists to discuss some of the most important (and controversial!) topics of the day.

We have invited a group of experts from all over the world to share the secrets of successful Muslim wives.

From spiritual frameworks to emotional tools, from practical techniques to sexual strategies, they spilled ALL the tea!

Our expert panel discussed the following questions:

What are the challenges facing Muslim wives today?

How can we as wives impact our relationships in a more positive way?

Get access to the expert seminars

Maryam Lemu: Creating a Code of Conduct for our Marriage

Salma Lingard: Identifying YOU and how YOU relate in your relationships

Umm Talha: The Art of Marriage

Coaches Nyla and Fatimah: Can We Talk? Secrets to Effective Communication

Village Auntie: Between the Sheets: Maximizing Marital Pleasure

The standard ticket gives you lifetime access to the panel discussion and all seminars and workshops.

Please note, all patrons of The {VIRTUAL} Salon receive VIP passes to all sessions.

Angelica Lindsey-Ali is a community scholar whose research interests include the West African roots of African American Islamic identity and the role of sacred sexuality within West and East African cultures. She is a certified sexual health educator and has been working in the field of public health for the last 15 years and has been providing 1:1 support to women for 20+ years. She is trained in female reproductive and sexual health, HIV/STI prevention methods, epidemiology, prenatal and postnatal sex education and have certifications in a variety of behavioral health interventions.

Maryam Lemu is an international sought after speaker. She is very engaged in her true passion which is Premarital and Marital Guidance and Life Coaching.

She has shared the stage with renowned speakers and scholars like Ismail Mufti Menk, Sheikh Muhammad Salah, Naima Robert, Bilal Philips and many more. She is a regular on the Nigerian Television scene with her Human Development Series and her marriage talks. She recently accepted an offer to host an Islamic Television talk show on cable TV.

Megan is a speaker, trainer, life & relationship coach, author, entrepreneur, homeschooler, wife, and mother who is passionate about helping others build meaningful lives and relationships.

Through her organisation Wives of Jannah, she invites emotionally intelligent Muslim wives to create a loving, emotionally deep, spiritual and passionate marriage; to rekindle marriage as an act of worship, a path to being nearer to our Creator, and a gateway to being a wife in Jannah, inshaâ€™Allah. She is passionate about helping others live wholesome, emotionally connected, and spiritual lives for the sake of Allah. Also loves dark hot chocolate.
